doc: Some weird path loading issues which can be fixed by starting the scenario multiple times in a row without closing down the game. I found this issue by looking at the Path menu and also noticed the Park Entrance disappearing.
2. Open a scenario or savegame with preferable mutliple paths.
3. Look in the path menu. (some paths should be missing.)
6. Take another look in the path menu. (less paths should be missing then before)
My Example, I also tried this with a savegame
